featured.text: While one person enjoys playing seventy-two holes of golf a week, another would rather play three sweaty, competitive games of tennis.

definition.zh_def: 高爾夫球，一種在草地上用球杆擊打小球進入一系列洞中的運動。
definition.en_def: A sport played on a large outdoor course, where players use clubs to hit a small ball into a series of holes in as few strokes as possible.
definition.example: He plays golf every Saturday with his friends.
